com.interpss.core.aclf.adj
Interface TapControl

All Superinterfaces:
BranchFlowControl, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IAclfAdjustment, NameTag, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
TapControlImpl
public interface TapControl
extends BranchFlowControl

A representation of the model object 'Tap VControl'. TapControl is designed to use transformer tap (on the from side or the to side) to control a bus voltage or a branch Q flow. The bus could be the transformer's terminal bus or any bus in the network. The branch has to the transformer itself.

The following features are supported:

  • Control Type
  • Tap Step Size
  • Tap Steps
  • Compensate Z
  • Vc Bus

See Also:
AclfAdjustPackage.getTapControl()

Method Detail

getControlType

XfrTapControlType getControlType()
Returns the value of the 'Control Type' attribute. The default value is "BusVoltage". The literals are from the enumeration XfrTapControlType.

If the meaning of the 'Control Type' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

tap control type

Returns:
the value of the 'Control Type' attribute.
